Package slitherio.model

Class Arena

java.lang.Object
slitherio.model.Arena
Direct Known Subclasses:
SlitherIoGame, SnakeGame, SnakeSlitherGame
public abstract class Arena extends Object
Représente un jeu. C'est la classe principale des jeux. Une Arena s'occupe de gérer les différents éléments du jeu, d'appliquer les règles. Le jeu se déroule sur une arène appelée WORLD, avec ses dimensions worldWidth et worldHeight.
See Also:
  • ListProperty
  • SimpleListProperty

  • Field Details

    • players

      private final javafx.beans.property.ListProperty<Player> players
      Defines the list of players.

    • foods

      private final javafx.beans.property.ListProperty<Food> foods
      Defines the list of foods.

    • snakes

      private final javafx.beans.property.ListProperty<Snake> snakes
      Defines the list of snakes. They all belong to one player of players, and they are bound to it.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • bindPlayers()

      private double worldWidth
      Defines the world's width.

    • worldHeight

      private double worldHeight
      Defines the world's height.

    • width

      private double width
      Defines the window's width. The width of the displayed part of the world.

    • height

      private double height
      Defines the window's height. The height of the displayed part of the world.

  • Constructor Details

    • Arena

      public Arena(double worldWidth, double worldHeight, double width, double height)
      Constructor for use by subclasses. This constructor calls bindPlayers().
      Parameters:
      worldWidth - see worldWidth
      worldHeight - see worldHeight
      width - see width
      height - see height

  • Method Details

    • bindPlayers

      private final void bindPlayers()
      Bind players and snakes. When players changes, i.e a player is added or removed, then snakes changes in the same way.

    • isValidFoodPosition

      protected final boolean isValidFoodPosition(Food food)
      Return true if the food is in a valid position. I.e if the food doesn't collides with any snake.
      Returns:
      Return true if the food is in a valid position.

    • getValidRandomFood

      protected final Food getValidRandomFood()
      Return a food that is at a valid position. This method try to create a food in a valid position. If there is not valid position after 500 attemps, return a food with random position.
      Returns:
      food with valid position or random position

    • update

      public abstract void update(double dt)
      Update all values of the game. Manage collides with food, other snakes, window...
      Parameters:
      dt - the elapsed time

    • onKeyPressed

      public abstract void onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key)
      Manage action when a key is pressed, for each player.
      Parameters:
      key - the key that has been pressed

    • onMouseMoved

      public abstract void onMouseMoved(double pointerX, double pointerY)
      Manage action when the mouse is moved, for each player.
      Parameters:
      pointerX - X-coordinate of the mouse
      pointerY - Y-coordinate of the mouse

    • endGame

      public abstract boolean endGame()
      Return true if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over
